signIn.title: Welcome to Meshy
signIn.subtitle: Enter your email to get started.
signIn.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

status.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team
status.checkEmailInstruction: Check your email and click the verification link to continue.

success.title: Login Successful!
success.description: You have been successfully logged in. Welcome back!

failed.title: Login Failed
failed.description: We couldn't sign you in. Please check your credentials and try again.

pending.title: Login Pending
pending.description: Your login is being processed. Please wait a moment.

blocked.title: Account Blocked
blocked.description: Your account has been temporarily blocked. Please contact support for assistance.

expired.title: Session Expired
expired.description: Your login session has expired. Please sign in again.

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.description: Your account has been created successfully. You can now sign in.

pending_verification.title: Verify Your Email
pending_verification.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
pending_verification.instruction: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again in a few minutes.

failed.title: Registration Failed
failed.description: We couldn't create your account. Please check your information and try again.

email_sent.title: Verification Email Sent
email_sent.description: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

success.title: Email Verified!
success.description: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now access all features.

failed.title: Verification Failed
failed.description: We couldn't verify your email address. The verification link may be invalid or corrupted.

expired.title: Verification Link Expired
expired.description: The verification link has expired. Please request a new verification email.

already_verified.title: Already Verified
already_verified.description: Your email address is already verified. You can proceed to login.

email_sent.title: Reset Email Sent
email_sent.description: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address. Please check your inbox.

success.title: Password Reset Successful!
success.description: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now sign in with your new password.

failed.title: Reset Failed
failed.description: We couldn't reset your password. Please try again or contact support.

expired.title: Reset Link Expired
expired.description: The password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

invalid_token.title: Invalid Reset Link
invalid_token.description: The password reset link is invalid or has been used already. Please request a new one.

not_started.title: Identity Verification Required
not_started.description: Complete identity verification to access premium features and increase your account limits.

pending.title: Verification Submitted
pending.description: Your identity verification has been submitted and is pending review. We'll notify you once it's processed.

under_review.title: Under Review
under_review.description: Our team is currently reviewing your identity verification documents. This process typically takes 1-3 business days.

approved.title: Identity Verified!
approved.description: Your identity has been successfully verified. You now have access to all premium features.

rejected.title: Verification Rejected
rejected.description: Your identity verification was not approved. Please review the feedback and submit updated documents.

expired.title: Verification Expired
expired.description: Your identity verification has expired. Please submit new documents to maintain your verified status.
